para.text: A person becomes a limited partner:
Upon formation as provided in the partnership agreement; or
After formation, a person becomes a limited partner:
As provided in the partnership agreement;
As the result of a merger under subchapter X of this chapter or a transaction under Chapter 2 of this title;
With the consent of all the partners; or
A person may become a limited partner without:
Making or being obligated to make a contribution to the limited partnership.

annotations.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 301 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 rewrote the section.
